<onlyinclude>
'''25w32a''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.9]], released on August 5, 2025,<ref>{{snap|25w32a|August 5, 2025}}</ref> which adds new copper variant blocks.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''{{animate|Copper_Bars.png; Exposed_Copper_Bars.png; Weathered_Copper_Bars.png; Oxidized_Copper_Bars.png|32px}} [[Copper bars]]'''
* Functions like the existing [[iron bar]]s, but can be waxed.
* Crafted from [[copper ingot]]s, and oxidizes over time.
* Sixteen copper bars can be crafted using six [[copper ingot]]s.
{{crafting
|A1= Copper Ingot
|B1= Copper Ingot
|C1= Copper Ingot
|A2= Copper Ingot
|B2= Copper Ingot
|C2= Copper Ingot
|Output = Copper Bars,16
|ignoreusage=1
}}

'''{{animate|Copper Chain.png; Exposed Copper Chain.png; Weathered_Copper_Chain.png; Oxidized Copper Chain.png|32px}} [[Copper chain]]'''
* Functions like the existing [[iron chain]], but can be waxed.
* Crafted from [[copper ingot]]s and [[copper nugget]]s, and oxidizes over time.
* Copper chains can be crafted using a [[copper ingot]] and two [[copper nugget]]s.
{{crafting
|B1=Copper Nugget
|B2=Copper Ingot
|B3=Copper Nugget
|Output = Copper Chain
|ignoreusage=1
}}

'''{{animate|Copper Lantern.gif; Exposed Copper Lantern.gif; Weathered Copper Lantern.gif; Oxidized Copper Lantern.gif|32px}} [[Copper lantern]]'''
* Crafted using [[copper nugget]]s and one [[copper torch]].
* The lantern itself oxidizes, changing its look as it ages.
* Can be waxed.
* Functionally identical to the [[lantern]].
{{Crafting
|A1= Copper Nugget
|B1= Copper Nugget
|C1= Copper Nugget
|A2= Copper Nugget
|B2= Copper Torch
|C2= Copper Nugget
|A3= Copper Nugget
|B3= Copper Nugget
|C3= Copper Nugget
|Output= Copper Lantern
|type= Decoration block
|ignoreusage=1
}}

'''[[File:Copper Torch.gif|32px]] [[Copper torch]]'''
* A green variant of the torch crafted from a [[copper nugget]], [[coal]] or [[charcoal]], and [[stick]].
* Functionally identical to the [[torch]].
{{Crafting
|B1= Copper Nugget
|B2= Coal; Charcoal
|B3= Stick
|Output= Copper Torch, 4
|type= Decoration block
|ignoreusage=1
}}

=== General ===
'''[[Particles (Java Edition)|Particles]]'''
* Added {{cd|copper_fire_flame}}.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Block Tags
** Added {{cd|#bars}}
*** Contains all bar blocks.
** Added {{cd|#chains}}
*** Contains all [[chain]] blocks.
** Added {{cd|#lanterns}}
*** Contains all [[lantern]] blocks.
* Item Tags
** Added {{cd|#bars}}
*** Contains all bar block items.
** Added {{cd|#chains}}
*** Contains all chain block items.
** Added {{cd|#lanterns}}
*** Contains all lantern block items.

'''[[Text component format]]'''
* {{cd|object}}
** New text component with type {{cd|object}} has been added.
** This component will display a single sprite from sprite atlas as a character.
** Sprites are always rendered as a rectangle, 8x8 pixels in size.
** Format:
*** {{cd|atlas}} - namespaced ID of a sprite atlas, default value: {{cd|minecraft:blocks}}
*** {{cd|sprite}} - namespaced ID of a sprite in atlas, for example {{cd|item/porkchop}}
** General note about atlas contents:
*** Sprite Atlases contain textures for items, blocks, mob effects, GUI elements, etc.
*** Contents are controlled by files in {{cd|assets/minecraft/atlases/}} directory in a resource pack.
*** Current contents can be reviewed with the {{Key|F3+S}} key combination.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Copper golem statue]]s'''
* Now always drop as item when mined.
* Now pop off as an item when pushed by a piston.

'''[[Copper trapdoor]]'''
* The crafting recipe now uses 4 [[copper ingots]], instead of 6.
* The old recipe is now used by Copper Bars.
* The crafting recipe now produces 1 copper trapdoor instead of 2.
{{Crafting
|A1 = Copper Ingot
|B1 = Copper Ingot
|A2 = Copper Ingot
|B2 = Copper Ingot
|A3 = 
|B3 = 
|Output = Copper Trapdoor
|ignoreusage = 1
|type = Redstone
}}

'''[[Iron chain]]'''
* Renamed from "Chain".

'''[[Shelf]]'''
* Items on the shelf have been repositioned to sit on the shelf.

=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|83.0}}.

'''[[Entity data]]'''
* {{cd|copper_golem}}
** The {{cd|weather_state}} field now expects a string id instead of integer id.
*** {{cd|0}} &rarr; {{cd|unaffected}}
*** {{cd|1}} &rarr; {{cd|exposed}}
*** {{cd|2}} &rarr; {{cd|weathered}}
*** {{cd|3}} &rarr; {{cd|oxidized}}

'''[[Loot table]]s'''
* Added {{cd|harvest/sweet_berry_bush}} loot table for drops when a [[sweet berry bush]] with sweet berries is harvested by interacting with it.

'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The version is now {{cd|65.1}}.
* Added new block sprites: {{cd|copper_bars}}, {{cd|copper_chain}}, {{cd|copper_lantern}}, {{cd|copper_torch}}, {{cd|exposed_copper_bars}}, {{cd|exposed_copper_chain}}, {{cd|exposed_copper_lantern}}, {{cd|oxidized_copper_bars}}, {{cd|oxidized_copper_chain}}, {{cd|oxidized_copper_lantern}}, {{cd|weathered_copper_bars}}, {{cd|weathered_copper_chain}}, {{cd|weathered_copper_lantern}}
* Added new item sprites: {{cd|copper_chain}}, {{cd|copper_lantern}}, {{cd|exposed_copper_chain}}, {{cd|exposed_copper_lantern}}, {{cd|oxidized_copper_chain}}, {{cd|oxidized_copper_lantern}}, {{cd|weathered_copper_chain}}, {{cd|weathered_copper_lantern}}

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added {{cd|copper_torch}} to {{cd|#wall_post_override}} block tag.
* Added {{cd|d=and|#chains|#bars|#lanterns}}, and removed {{cd|d=and|chain|iron_bars|lantern|soul_lantern}} to {{cd|#mineable/pickaxe}} block tag.
